name: Golf with Dice
description:
Golf with Dice is a golf game where the ball is replaced with a die. Whatever the die lands on will be added to your score. This is my first game and is a bit buggy. It will be updated in the future.

Controls:

Hold and Release the Spacebar to increase power and launch the die.

Drag with the Left Mouse Button to change the camera angle.

Escape (Esc) to pause and unpause the game.
